description: AI-powered intelligence layer for Santa's letter processing and delivery operations

tools.description: Cleans raw text by removing excess whitespace, special characters, and normalizing format. Use this when analyzing or displaying letter content.
Normalizes Canadian province abbreviations and misspellings to full province names. Use when searching or filtering by province.
Normalizes common city name misspellings and variations. Use when searching or filtering by city.
Standardizes gift names to canonical product names (e.g., 'PS5' â†’ 'PlayStation 5'). Use when analyzing or comparing gift requests.
Categorizes gift names into standardized product categories (Gaming Consoles, Electronics, Toys, etc.). Use for trend analysis and supply planning.
Scores letters from 0-100 based on politeness, gratitude, and kindness indicators. Higher scores = nicer children. Use for behavior analysis and prioritization.
Calculates delivery priority (1=High, 2=Medium, 3=Low) based on letter urgency and nice score. Use for logistics and delivery planning.
Extracts count of gifts from comma or 'and' separated list. Use to understand request volume per child.
Extracts the first gift mentioned from a comma or 'and' separated list. Use to identify primary gift request.
Validates Canadian postal code format (A1A 1A1). Use for data quality checks and address validation.
Categorizes children into age groups (Toddler, Child, Preteen, Teen). Use for age-based analysis and gift recommendations.
